tool_description: Analyzes and recommends optimal data types for entity attributes based on constraints and usage patterns.

entity_id.description: Entity identifier to analyze data types for

database_system.description: Target database system (MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle, SQL_Server)

performance_priority.description: Optimization priority: storage, performance, or compatibility

error_messages: Entity not found: The specified entity_id does not exist in the schema.
Unsupported database system: Database system must be one of [MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle, SQL_Server].
Invalid performance priority: Priority must be one of [storage, performance, compatibility].
No attributes found: Entity has no attributes to analyze data types for.
usage: Provide entity_id and target database_system. Optionally specify performance_priority to optimize recommendations for storage efficiency, query performance, or cross-platform compatibility.

type_recommendations.description: Recommended data types for each attribute

optimization_notes.description: Notes on data type optimizations and trade-offs
